languages.text: "Это было бы прискорбно. Ведь если бы Ризза разгласила столь ценные сведения бесплатно, ее партнеры очень расстроились и постарались избыть это чувство... привычными для их суровых натур способами".

traits.locale_text: "Это было бы прискорбно. Ведь если бы Ризза разгласила столь ценные сведения бесплатно, ее партнеры очень расстроились и постарались избыть это чувство... привычными для их суровых натур способами".

languages.text: "That would be a real shame. Because if Ryzza divulged such valuable information for free, it'd make her associates very upset. But they're hard people, and they'd try to get over the feeling by doing what hard people do."
languages.original_text: "Это было бы прискорбно. Ведь если бы Ризза разгласила столь ценные сведения бесплатно, ее партнеры очень расстроились и постарались избыть это чувство... привычными для их суровых натур способами".

traits.locale_text: "That would be a real shame. Because if Ryzza were to divulge such valuable information for free, it would make her partners so very sad, and they would try to get over this feeling... by resorting to methods customary for people of harsh character."

"That would be a real shame. Because if Ryzza were to divulge such valuable information for free, it would make her partners so very sad, and they would try to get over this feeling... by resorting to methods customary for people of harsh character."

"That would be a real shame. Because if Ryzza divulged such valuable information for free, it'd make her associates very upset. But they're hard people, and they'd try to get over the feeling by doing what hard people do."

"That would be a real shame. Because if Ryzza divulged such valuable information for free, it'd make her associates very upset. But they're hard people, and they'd try to get over the feeling by doing what hard people do."

"That would be a real shame. Because if Ryzza divulged such valuable information for free, it'd make her associates very upset. But they're hard people, and they'd try to get over the feeling by doing what hard people do."

languages.text: « Ce serait regrettable, car si Ryzza révélait gratuitement une information aussi précieuse, ses associés le prendraient très mal. Mais ils ne se laisseraient pas abattre et ils s'efforceraient de surmonter ce mécontentement en faisant ce que les gens coriaces comme eux ont l'habitude de faire. »
languages.original_text: "That would be a real shame. Because if Ryzza divulged such valuable information for free, it'd make her associates very upset. But they're hard people, and they'd try to get over the feeling by doing what hard people do."

traits.locale_text: « Ce serait regrettable, car si Ryzza révélait gratuitement une information aussi précieuse, ses associés le prendraient très mal. Mais ils ne se laisseraient pas abattre et ils s'efforceraient de surmonter ce mécontentement en faisant ce que les gens coriaces comme eux ont l'habitude de faire. »
